metadata.title: CVE-2018-1088 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A privilege escalation flaw was found in gluster 3.x snapshot scheduler.Any gluster client allowed to mount gluster volumes could also mount sharedgluster storage volume and escalate privileges by scheduling maliciouscronjob via symlink.

criterions.comment: glusterfs: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
